entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle late this evening. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
